job.title: Site reliability Engineer
job.description: Preferred QualificationsDevOps Experience Public Cloud Experience (Microsoft Azure)Container Concepts (Docker)Orchestration (Kubernetes)Source Control (GitHub, Bitbucket, Azure Repos etc)Continuous Integration ( Azure Pipelines, Jenkins, Bamboo etc)Continuous Deployment (Azure DevOps, Jenkins etc)Experience with infrastructure automation tools (Terraform, Packer, Puppet, Ansible etc)Scripting Experience (Python, Ruby, Bash, Shell, Node.js)Security and Network awarenessProduct MindsetLearnabilitySelf MotivatedExperience in Agile methodologiesExperience working with global teams Good communication & interpersonal skillsMinimum Qualifications5 years of IT industry experience with a Bachelor's/Master's Degree in Computer Science or equivalentStrong Software Engineering PrinciplesProduct Company Experience
